summary: Feature request to rehydrate TypedSearchAttributes for sinks or provide a WorkflowInfo variant, following discussion in issue #1612 about improving type safety for search attributes in workflow context.
userImpact: Users need better type safety when working with TypedSearchAttributes in workflow sinks and need access to rehydrated typed versions.
proposedFix: Either rehydrate TypedSearchAttributes for sinks or provide a WorkflowInfo variant that supports typed search attributes
